title: Qal’at Sem’an/Church of Saint Simeon Stylites
description: An ancient church, located in modern Syria. Inscribed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2011 as part of the "Ancient Villages of Northern Syria."

properties.description: Location of the ruins of Qal’at Sem’an/Church of Saint Simeon Stylites. Coordinates determined from UNESCO World Heritage list and verified by eye in Google Earth in October 2012.
properties.title: Ruins of the ancient Church of Saint Simeon Stylites
